div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 73 Arta (and. Ambracia) environs, Epirus, 1955 Burial: c. 350-325 B.C.? (T) Contents: 62 AR. Pot hoard? Chalcis: 1 dr. Sicyon: 60 triob.* Elis: 1 triob. (as BMC 92) Disposition: O. Dodson List on file in ANS * In addition to the 60 pieces of 4th cent. date, the record includes 1 triob. of a later period (as BMC 201-2), which would seem to be intrusive
